column1:
Olive Garden Flatiron has closed.


[One of the finest dining establishments our city has to offer has closed](https://www.google.com/#q=olive+garden+flatiron+closed)  
  
But don't worry, the Times Sq location is still open!  
  
EDIT for the guy that said this isn't technically a question: "So where will /u/sospidera treat his girlfriend to fancy dinners now???"
What's in your Go Bag, and what's your escape plan if something goes off the rails in NYC?

What is the best deli sandwich in NYC?


Please add: Name of Place, Location of Place, Name of Sandwich, any other details
Thanks!
